00035         UpperLeft = 0,          
00036         UpperRight,                     
00037         LowerRight,

00042 struct FPoint
00043 {
00045         float x;
00046 
00048         float y;
00049 
00051         bool operator==(const FPoint& lhs)const { return (x==lhs.x && y==lhs.y); }
00053         bool operator!=(const FPoint& lhs)const { return !(*this==lhs); }
00054 };
00055 
00056 typedef std::vector<FPoint> FPointVector;
00057 
00059 struct FRegion
00060 {
00062         void Clear(){ pts.clear(); }
00063 
00065         FPointVector pts;
00066 
00068         bool operator==(const FRegion& lhs) const 
00069         { 
00070                 if(lhs.pts.size() == pts.size())
00071                 {
00072                         size_t sz = pts.size();
00073                         for(size_t i = 0; i < sz; i++)
00074                         {
00075                                 if(lhs.pts[i] == pts[i]) continue;
00076                                 return false;
00077                         }
00078                         return true;
00079                 }
00080                 return false;
00081         }
00082 
00083         bool operator!=(const FRegion& lhs)const { return !(*this==lhs); }
00084 };
00085 
00086 typedef std::vector<FRegion> FRegionVector;
00087 
00089 struct FGridCoords
00090 {
00091         /* Empty constructor */
00092         FGridCoords() { upperleft.x = 0.0f, upperleft.y = 0.0f; upperright = lowerright = lowerleft = upperleft; }
00093 
00095         FGridCoords(const FRegion& r)
00096         {
00097                 upperleft.x = 0.0f, upperleft.y = 0.0f; upperright = lowerright = lowerleft = upperleft;
00098                 if (r.pts.size()>=4)
00099                 {
00100                 upperleft = r.pts.at(UpperLeft); upperright = r.pts.at(UpperRight);
00101                 lowerright = r.pts.at(LowerRight); lowerleft = r.pts.at(LowerLeft);
00102                 }
00103         }
00104 
00106         operator FRegion()
00107         {
00108                 FRegion r;
00109                 r.pts.resize(4);
00110                 r.pts[UpperLeft] = upperleft; r.pts[UpperRight] = upperright; r.pts[LowerRight] = lowerright; r.pts[LowerLeft] = lowerleft;
00111                 return r;
00112         }
00113 
00115         bool IsEmpty() const
00116         {
00117                 if (upperleft == upperright && lowerleft == lowerright && upperleft == lowerleft)
00118                         return true;
00119                 return false;
00120         }
00121 
00123         FPoint upperleft;
00124 
00126         FPoint upperright;
00127 
00129         FPoint lowerright;
00130 
00132         FPoint lowerleft;
00133 };

00145         bool operator==(const Point& lhs)const { return (x==lhs.x && y==lhs.y); }
00147         bool operator!=(const Point& lhs)const { return !(*this==lhs); }
00148 };

00171 struct GridCoords
00172 {
00174         GridCoords() { upperleft.x = 0; upperleft.y = 0; upperright = lowerright = lowerleft = upperleft; }
00175 
00177         GridCoords(const Region& r)
00178         {
00179                 upperleft.x = 0; upperleft.y = 0; upperright = lowerright = lowerleft = upperleft;
00180                 if (r.pts.size()>=4)
00181                 {
00182                         upperleft = r.pts.at(UpperLeft); upperright = r.pts.at(UpperRight);
00183                         lowerright = r.pts.at(LowerRight); lowerleft = r.pts.at(LowerLeft);
00184                 }
00185         }
00186 
00188         operator Region()
00189         {
00190                 Region r;
00191                 r.pts.resize(4);
00192                 r.pts[UpperLeft] = upperleft; r.pts[UpperRight] = upperright; r.pts[LowerRight] = lowerright; r.pts[LowerLeft] = lowerleft;
00193                 return r;
00194         }
00195 
00197         bool IsEmpty() const
00198         {
00199                 if (upperleft == upperright && lowerleft == lowerright && upperleft == lowerleft)
00200                         return true;
00201                 return false;
00202         }
00203 
00205         Point upperleft;
00206 
00208         Point upperright;
00209 
00211         Point lowerright;
00212 
00214         Point lowerleft;
00215 };

00225 class XYCoord
00226 {
00227 public:
00228 
00230         XYCoord() { xCoord = 0; yCoord = 0; }
00231 
00233         XYCoord(int16_t x, int16_t y) { xCoord = x; yCoord = y; }
00235         ~XYCoord() {}
00236 
00238         int16_t xCoord;
00240         int16_t yCoord;
00241 
00243         XYCoord operator=(const XYCoord &p) { xCoord = p.xCoord; yCoord = p.yCoord; return *this; }
00245         bool operator==(const XYCoord &p) const { return (xCoord == p.xCoord && yCoord == p.yCoord); }
00247         bool operator!=(const XYCoord &p) const { return (xCoord != p.xCoord || yCoord != p.yCoord); }
00249         bool operator<(const XYCoord& p) const { return (yCoord < p.yCoord ? true : ((yCoord == p.yCoord && xCoord < p.xCoord) ? true : false)); }
00250 };
00251 
00253 typedef std::vector<XYCoord> XYCoordVector;

00259 typedef std::vector<XYCoord>::const_iterator XYCoordConstIt;
